PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-11542016-12-16,  TC,  ,  , 
ActRailway Safety Act
SubjectPrevention and Control of Fires on Line Works Regulations
PrecisPREVENTION AND CONTROL OF FIRES ON LINE WORKS REGULATIONS in order to (1) enhance rail safety by reducing the likelihood of fires occurring on line works that result from railway operations; (2) clarify the requirements with respect to the control and prevention of fires to facilitate compliance and enforcement; and (3) extend requirements for the prevention and control of fires to all companies that fall under federal jurisdiction.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0317 Publication Date: 2016-12-28
